1   package org.lindbergframework.persistence;
2   
3   import java.sql.Connection;
4   import java.sql.SQLException;
5   import java.util.ArrayList;
6   import java.util.List;
7   
8   import javax.sql.DataSource;
9   
10  import org.lindbergframework.core.context.LindbergBeanContext;
11  import org.lindbergframework.exception.BeanPopulateException;
12  import org.lindbergframework.exception.PersistenceException;
13  import org.lindbergframework.persistence.beans.BeanPopulator;
14  import org.lindbergframework.persistence.configuration.LinpConfiguration;
15  import org.lindbergframework.persistence.context.LinpContext;
16  import org.lindbergframework.persistence.sql.DataSet;
17  import org.lindbergframework.persistence.sql.SqlCommandResolver;
18  
19  /**
20   * abstract template base with main resources for all persistence template implementations.
21   *   
22   * @author Victor Lindberg
23   *
24   */
25  public abstract class TemplateBase implements PersistenceTemplate {
26  	
27      /**
28       * bean populator implementation to use.
29       */
30  	private BeanPopulator beanPopulator;
31  	
32  	/**
33  	 * data source implementation to use.
34  	 */
35  	private DataSource dataSource;
36  	
37  	/**
38  	 * data source configuration to use.
39  	 */
40  	private DataSourceConfig dataSourceConfig;
41  	
42  	/**
43  	 * persistence context instance.
44  	 */
45  	protected LinpContext context = LinpContext.getInstance();
46  	
47  	/**
48  	 * Default Constructor that configures default bean populator and data source implementation.
49  	 */
50  	public TemplateBase(){
51  		configureDefaultPopulator();
52  		configureDefaultDataSource();
53  	}
54  	
55  	public TemplateBase(BeanPopulator populator){
56  		setBeanPopulator(populator);
57  		configureDefaultDataSource();
58  	}
59  	
60  	public TemplateBase(DataSourceConfig dsConfig){
61  		setDataSourceConfig(dsConfig);
62  		configureDefaultPopulator();
63  	}
64  	
65  	public TemplateBase(BeanPopulator populator, DataSourceConfig dsConfig){
66          setBeanPopulator(populator);
67          setDataSourceConfig(dsConfig);
68      }
69  
70  	/**
71  	 * {@inheritDoc}
72  	 */
73  	public void configureDefaultPopulator(){
74  		BeanPopulator beanPopulator = LindbergBeanContext.getInstance().getBean(LinpConfiguration.DEFAULT_BEAN_POPULATOR);
75  		setBeanPopulator(beanPopulator);
76  	}
77  	
78  	/**
79  	 * {@inheritDoc}
80  	 */
81  	public void configureDefaultDataSource(){
82  		setDataSourceConfig(context.getDataSourceConfig());
83  	}
84  	
85  	/**
86  	 * {@inheritDoc}
87  	 */
88  	public void setDataSourceConfig(DataSourceConfig dataSourceConfig) {
89  	   if (dataSourceConfig == null)
90  		   throw new PersistenceException("DataSourceConfig can not to be null");
91  	   
92  	   this.dataSourceConfig = dataSourceConfig;
93  	   this.dataSource = dataSourceConfig.getDataSource();
94  	}
95  	
96  	/**
97  	 * {@inheritDoc}
98  	 */
99  	public DataSourceConfig getDataSourceConfig() {
100 		return dataSourceConfig;
101 	}
102 
103 	/**
104 	 * Populates the {@link DataSet} result as a list of beans using the configured bean populator
105 	 * implementation in this template.
106 	 * 
107 	 * @param <E> expected bean type.
108 	 * @param clazz bean class for population.
109 	 * @param ds {@link DataSet} implementation to populate.
110 	 * @return populated beans list.
111 	 * @throws SQLException error access {@link DataSet}.
112 	 * @throws BeanPopulateException population failed.
113 	 */
114 	public <E> List<E> populateBeans(Class<E> clazz, DataSet ds) throws SQLException, BeanPopulateException{
115 		ds.beforeFirst();
116 		List<E> list = new ArrayList<E>();
117 		
118 		boolean directValue = ds.getMetaData().getColumnCount() == 1;
119 		while (ds.next()){
120 		   E newBean;
121 		   if (directValue)
122 		      newBean = beanPopulator.populateDirectValue(clazz, ds);
123 		   else
124 		      newBean = beanPopulator.populate(clazz, ds);
125 		   list.add(newBean);
126 		}
127 		
128 		return list;
129 	}
130 	
131 	/**
132 	 * Populates a bean for unique result. Only first record from {@link DataSet} will be populated.
133 	 * 
134 	 * @param <E> expected bean type.
135      * @param clazz bean class for population.
136      * @param ds {@link DataSet} implementation to populate.
137      * @return populated bean.
138      * @throws SQLException error access {@link DataSet}.
139      * @throws BeanPopulateException population failed.
140 	 */
141 	public <E> E populateBean(Class<E> clazz,DataSet ds) throws SQLException, BeanPopulateException{
142 		ds.first();
143 		
144 		return beanPopulator.populate(clazz, ds);
145 	}
146 	
147 	/**
148 	 * {@inheritDoc}
149 	 */
150 	public void setBeanPopulator(BeanPopulator beanPopulator) {
151 		this.beanPopulator = beanPopulator;
152 	}
153 	
154 	/**
155 	 * {@inheritDoc}
156 	 */
157 	public BeanPopulator getBeanPopulator() {
158 		return beanPopulator;
159 	}
160 
161 	/**
162 	 * {@inheritDoc}
163 	 */
164 	public DataSource getDataSource() {
165 		return dataSource;
166 	}
167 	
168 	
169 	/**
170 	 * {@inheritDoc}
171 	 */
172 	public Connection getConnection() throws SQLException{
173 	   verifyDataSource();
174 		   
175 	   return getDataSource().getConnection();
176 	}
177 	
178 	/**
179 	 * Checks if the data source is configured.
180 	 */
181 	protected void verifyDataSource(){
182 		if (getDataSource() == null)
183 			throw new IllegalStateException("No DataSource defined. Use LinpContext class to configure the default context persistence parameters");
184 	}
185 	
186 	/**
187 	 * {@inheritDoc}
188 	 */
189 	public SqlCommandResolver getSqlCommandResolver(){
190 		return context.getSqlCommandResolver();
191 	}
192 	
193 }
